author: jdonnerstag
msg: added a few very simple jwebunit tests to cover most of the examples. It merely loads the page and validates the content. Hopefully it helps to discover failures earlier which have not been detected by the wicket-core junit tests.

author: jdonnerstag
msg: Due to ModificationWatcher a separate thread is used to read the markup file. Because of the thread Application.get() does not work for everything that is related to MarkupParser and IMarkupFilters. The application object must now be provided the markup parsers constructor

author: jdonnerstag
msg: Extended/fixed "deployment"/"development" mode determination. Obviously "dev" used to be the default and now it is "deployment" which makes sense. But the web.xml context params were no longer evaluated which is why the examples haven't been in development mode since the change.
